# Cancelled Government Tender Announcement

**title-titre-eng**: Cancelled
**title-titre-fra**: Annulé

## Tender Details

* ** Solicitation Number **: EA003-222461/A
* ** Publication Date **: 2022-09-02
* ** Tender Closing Date **: 2022-09-19T12:30:52 ( CLOSED )
* ** Amendment Date **: 2023-01-24
* **Tender Status **: Cancelled

## Solicitation Overview

The solicitation for the aforementioned project is hereby announced as cancelled. The details provided below remain for informational purposes only.

* ** Government Services Identification Number (GSIN)  **: 5164C
* ** Industry Category **: Building Fire Protection Systems
* ** Trade Agreements **: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Procurement Details

* ** Procurement Method **: Competitive - Open Bidding
* ** Selection Criteria **: None
* ** Regions of Opportunity **: Not specified
* ** Regions of Delivery **: Newfoundland and Labrador

## Contracting Entity

* ** Contracting Entity **: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* ** Contract Address **: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* ** Contact Person **: Adam Beaumaster
* ** Email **: adam.beaumaster@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
* ** Phone **: (709) 330-7142
* ** Fax **: (709) 772-4603
* ** Mailing Address **: John Cabot Building, 10 Barters Hill, P.O. Box 4600, St. John's, NL A1C 5T2, Canada

Please note that the solicitation is no longer active, and no further responses will be accepted. The cancelling of this tender is final, and no future solicitations will be made for this project. Apr 2024. ended= 400. words.
